name: George Lavidas
goal:
My proposals are based on the highest scientific standards, supported by evidence based approaches and irrefutable facts.
My area of expertise is ocean climate analysis, climate chance, ocean and renewable energies.
My goal is to provide highly scientific support, plan action and disseminate proposal based on the highest scientific standards.
euInitiatives: Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative I follow are Horizon 2020, ERA-NET, NER 300/400,  associated programs for the development of renewable energies and the wave climate
